AnyBox.js File Reference

Detailed Description

Creates HTML elements.

It creates any HTML elements in WPS way.

Author:
Sundew H. Shin
See also:
WSS

 AnyBox Constructor.

Variable Documentation

W AnyBox
 

Initial value:

 function(tag){var self = this;
    this.body = document.createElement('div');
    this.core = document.createElement(tag);
    
    this.body.appendChild(this.core);
    W.style(this.core, '|width:100%;height:100%');
    W.event(window, 'onload', addWidget);

    function addWidget(){
        
        W.add(self);
    };
}
AnyBox Constructor.

This control will help you to create any HTML element very easily and quickly.

Parameters:
tag tag for a HTML Element
wss WSS(Wednus Styling System) valid string value

Bug:
applying style before WPS reveals the transition. object reveal at the original place first and it moves to the position it supposed to be. check CodeExample.html
Examples:
AnyBox.html, CodeExample.html, and rainbow.html.
